Package com.karangandhi.networking.utils

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OwnerObject
    This the class and the default methods that must be inherited by the server and the client class
    Tasks.ReadMessageTask.Callback
    This is the callback that is called when a message appears on the input stream
    Tasks.ReadMessageTask.DisconnectCallback
    This is the callback that is called when the server or the client closes the connection
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Message<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>,Q extends java.io.Serializable>
    This is the message class that will be written and read from the stream of the socket.
    MessageHeader<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
    Creates the MessageHeader that is read from the stream before the Message body
    Tasks
    This contains all the tasks that will be used be the server and the client
    Tasks.ReadMessageTask
    This is the readMessage task that is assigned by the connection to the Owner Context
